client.app.obj

Class Database

  • java.lang.Object
    • client.app.obj.Database

  • public class Database
extends Object
    Class representing a database store. Keeps all information about User objects and their corresponding Events. Allows for program persistence after termination. Contains functions to modify an XML document as a record. Used by Client to manipulate program state.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor.

        public Database()
        Constructor. Checks for existence of appliation record. Loads it if available, makes new one if not.

    • Method Detail

      • findUser

        public Element findUser(String tag,
                        String elemid)
                 throws ElementNotFoundException
        Throws:
        ElementNotFoundException

      • addUser

        public void addUser(Element u)
        Function to add a new User to the data store. Creates XML structure for a new User with no subcscriptions. DOES NOT check for User existence
        Parameters:
        u - Element object representing the User as an XML record

      • modifyUser

        public void modifyUser(String userid,
                       boolean add,
                       String f,
                       Element newelem)
                throws UserNotFoundException,
                       ElementNotFoundException
        Function to modify the XML record of a specified User by either adding to or deleting from the main XML fields. (e.g. myEvents, myOrgs mySchedules, myHostedEvents)
        Parameters:
        uname - the username of the User to modify
        add - a boolean value either true meaning add, false meaning delete.
        f - the main XMl field to alter {myEvents,myHostedEvents,mySchedules,myOrgs}
        newelem - a DOM Element Node containing all runtime information about the object to be stored in the main XML file.
        Throws:
        UserNotFoundException
        ElementNotFoundException

      • outputSearchResultString

        public String outputSearchResultString(String uname,
                                       String filters)
                                throws UserNotFoundException
        Throws:
        UserNotFoundException

      • verifyCredentials

        public boolean verifyCredentials(String uname,
                                 String pw)
                          throws ElementNotFoundException
        Function to check login credentials against a User already stored in the database.
        Returns:
        bool true if valid credentials; false otw
        Throws:
        ElementNotFoundException

      • writeToFile

        public static void writeToFile()
                        throws TransformerException
        Function to write the entire DOM model to local XML stored on the computer.
        Throws:
        TransformerException
